messages.text: Hi, Iâ€™m QuackGPT! Is there anything I can help with?

My throat feels very bad. It has been feeling very sore lately, and it hurts whenever I try to swallow food. My throat also appears very red and swollen. Other people also think that my voice sounds different than usual.
Sorry to hear that. Have you been in contact with any sick people in the last 14 days?
Do you have any accompanying symptoms (cough, runny nose, high temperature, etc.)?
Do you have any known allergies?
Just to cats, but I have not been in contact with one recently.
Have you been exposed to any new conditions in your household in the last 14 days?
It appears that you most likely have Strep throat, which is a bacterial infection affecting the throat.
